result.eng: I admit that I have made a mistake.
result.html: Admhaím go ndearna mé botúnI admit that I have made a mistake.
result.ponchtml: Adṁaím go ndearna mé botúnI admit that I have made a mistake.

result.ga: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breithe
result.orig: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breithe
result.html: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breitheDid you forget my birthday?
result.ponchtml: An ndearna tú dearmad ar mo lá breiṫeDid you forget my birthday?

result.ga: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.orig: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.html: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?

result.eng: It is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ga: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.orig: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.html: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ponchtml: Is aṁlaiḋ go ndearna an Taoiseaċ roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.

result.eng: Did you do all the work?
result.ga: An ndearna sibh an obair go léir
result.orig: An ndearna sibh an obair go léir
result.html: An ndearna sibh an obair go léirDid you do all the work?
result.ponchtml: An ndearna siḃ an obair go léirDid you do all the work?
